recipesJson.name: White wolf (vanilla RY1 üçÇcustard)
recipesJson.author: Slushy
recipesJson.description: My personal recipe for a rich vanilla RY1 .... My all time favorite custards include (WF) vanilla Runyan and (FA) premium I added Flavorah Turkish to the mix for spicy woodsy notes and toped it off with white chocolate and biscuit for added mouthfeel and texture super delicious give it a mix and tell me what you think...
